title: About
content:
Predrag Lazic #  Predrag wanted to be a pilot as a kid, then his eyesight went below 20/20. Since then his aspiration was to become an Astronaut.
In modern times his preference has been using technology to focus on open source software and the well being around an increasing global population.

title: Rigs
content: Blender Rigs #  Aquatic Monster Hand Pony Squishy Robot Amphibian Oxfox

title: Tutorials
content:
Tutorials #  Dynamic Fluid Rig

Cloth Flower Tutorial

title: Gingerbread Fingers
content: Took a walk through a forest, saw almost no one. Scrounging about town for bakeries and dessert.

title: The Earth Blushes in Flowers
content: Flower was an awesome video game.

title: Wear Sun Screen!
content: Since Summer is about to begin the ceremony is in. It’ll be a once in a lifetime opportunity, city streets are best not get isolated in.

title: Onion Skins Have Pigment
content: The machinery has been overheating a lot, good thing there’s an internal thermometer. It usually taps out at around 70 degrees celsius. Let’s paint some eggs!

title: Bzzt
content: Looking into alternative tech providers, spring cleaning!

title: Chlorophyll
content: Attempted homemade nutella with peanuts, cocoa powder and honey once. Bad idea, thumbs up for culinary disasters.

title: Seasons
content: Waking up to a foot of snow, untouched without visitors in the night. The end of winter is bitter and sweet since the animals are about and cold blistering hollow no more.

title: Workaholism
content: X-mas celebrations are coming to a close & waking up from a long hangover. Yes, it is January 31st and it’s dawning on everyone that life has to go on.

title: Logic
content: Completed a 1st logic network & almost ready to step into a new sculpture.
Happy New Year!

title: CC-0
content: Updated licensing info on music 4 videos.

title: Avalanche
content: If not for the absence of snow right now would be a-ok. Making deformations on a primate.

title: Acme
content: Comments have been removed on account of making website ugly.
Comms are up.

title: Test Phase Sum Up
content: Map clear, Starship launch at the ready.

title: Reference
content: From now on this here subset in recess has dedication outlined to keeping up to date on personal projects, w.i.ps and so on.

title: Site is Live!
content: Site is Live!
